mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM MEMBER WHERE MEMBER_TYPE='B'

SELECT DISTINCT M.MEMBER_NO, M.MEMBER_ID, M.MEMBER_NAME, M.PHONE, M.EMAIL, M.ENROLL_DATE, M.STATUS, (SELECT SUM(OIL) FROM OIL_LIST WHERE MEMBER_NO=M.MEMBER_NO GROUP BY MEMBER_NO) AS OIL FROM MEMBER M LEFT OUTER JOIN OIL_LIST O ON(M.MEMBER_NO=O.MEMBER_NO) WHERE M.MEMBER_TYPE='B' ORDER BY M.MEMBER_NO DESC

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM MEMBER WHERE MEMBER_TYPE='B'
AND STATUS IN('Y','N')
AND STATUS='Y'
AND STATUS='N'
AND MEMBER_ID LIKE '%'||#{memberId}||'%'
AND (TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(ENROLL_DATE,'rrrr/mm/dd'), 'yyyy/mm/dd') >= TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(#{today},'yyyy/mm/dd'), 'yyyy/mm/dd') AND TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(ENROLL_DATE,'rrrr/mm/dd'), 'yyyy/mm/dd') <= TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(SYSDATE,'rrrr/mm/dd'), 'yyyy/mm/dd'))
AND (TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(ENROLL_DATE,'rrrr-mm-dd'),'yyyy-mm-dd') >= TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(#{startDate},'yyyy-mm-dd'),'yyyy-mm-dd') AND TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(ENROLL_DATE,'rrrr-mm-dd'),'yyyy-mm-dd') <= TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(#{endDate},'yyyy-mm-dd'),'yyyy-mm-dd'))

SELECT DISTINCT M.MEMBER_NO, M.MEMBER_ID, M.MEMBER_NAME, M.PHONE, M.EMAIL, M.ENROLL_DATE, M.STATUS, (SELECT SUM(OIL) FROM OIL_LIST WHERE MEMBER_NO=M.MEMBER_NO GROUP BY MEMBER_NO) AS OIL FROM MEMBER M LEFT OUTER JOIN OIL_LIST O ON(M.MEMBER_NO=O.MEMBER_NO) WHERE M.MEMBER_TYPE='B'
AND M.STATUS IN('Y','N')
AND M.STATUS='Y'
AND M.STATUS='N'
AND M.MEMBER_ID LIKE '%'||#{memberId}||'%'
AND (TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(M.ENROLL_DATE,'rrrr/mm/dd'), 'yyyy/mm/dd') >= TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(#{today},'yyyy/mm/dd'), 'yyyy/mm/dd') AND TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(M.ENROLL_DATE,'rrrr/mm/dd'), 'yyyy/mm/dd') <= TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(SYSDATE,'rrrr/mm/dd'), 'yyyy/mm/dd'))
AND (TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(M.ENROLL_DATE,'rrrr-mm-dd'),'yyyy-mm-dd') >= TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(#{startDate},'yyyy-mm-dd'),'yyyy-mm-dd') AND TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(M.ENROLL_DATE,'rrrr-mm-dd'),'yyyy-mm-dd') <= TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(#{endDate},'yyyy-mm-dd'),'yyyy-mm-dd'))
ORDER BY M.MEMBER_NO DESC
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM OIL_LIST O INNER JOIN MEMBER M ON (M.MEMBER_NO=O.MEMBER_NO) WHERE O.OIL_LIST_TYPE IN('환전') AND M.MEMBER_TYPE='B'

SELECT O.OIL_LIST_NO, O.OIL_LIST_TYPE, O.OIL_LIST_DATE, O.OIL, O.MEMBER_NO, M.STATUS, O.PARKING_NO, O.RES_NO, O.PAYMENT_NO, O.TRANS_NO, M.MEMBER_ID, M.MEMBER_NAME FROM OIL_LIST O INNER JOIN MEMBER M ON (M.MEMBER_NO=O.MEMBER_NO) WHERE O.OIL_LIST_TYPE IN('환전') AND M.MEMBER_TYPE='B' ORDER BY OIL_LIST_NO DESC
SELECT O.OIL, O.OIL_LIST_TYPE FROM OIL_LIST O INNER JOIN MEMBER M ON (M.MEMBER_NO=O.MEMBER_NO) WHERE O.OIL_LIST_TYPE IN('환전') AND M.MEMBER_TYPE='B'

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM OIL_LIST O INNER JOIN MEMBER M ON (M.MEMBER_NO=O.MEMBER_NO) WHERE O.OIL_LIST_TYPE IN('환전') AND M.MEMBER_TYPE='B'
AND M.STATUS IN('Y','N')
AND M.STATUS='Y'
AND M.STATUS='N'
AND M.MEMBER_ID LIKE '%'||#{memberId}||'%'
AND (O.OIL BETWEEN TO_NUMBER(#{startMoney}) AND TO_NUMBER(#{endMoney}))
AND (TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(O.OIL_LIST_DATE,'rrrr/mm/dd'), 'yyyy/mm/dd') >= TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(#{today},'yyyy/mm/dd'), 'yyyy/mm/dd') AND TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(O.OIL_LIST_DATE,'rrrr/mm/dd'), 'yyyy/mm/dd') <= TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(SYSDATE,'rrrr/mm/dd'), 'yyyy/mm/dd'))
AND (TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(O.OIL_LIST_DATE,'rrrr-mm-dd'),'yyyy-mm-dd') >= TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(#{startDate},'yyyy-mm-dd'),'yyyy-mm-dd') AND TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(O.OIL_LIST_DATE,'rrrr-mm-dd'),'yyyy-mm-dd') <= TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(#{endDate},'yyyy-mm-dd'),'yyyy-mm-dd'))

SELECT O.OIL_LIST_NO, O.OIL_LIST_TYPE, O.OIL_LIST_DATE, O.OIL, O.MEMBER_NO, M.STATUS, O.PARKING_NO, O.RES_NO, O.PAYMENT_NO, O.TRANS_NO, M.MEMBER_ID, M.MEMBER_NAME FROM OIL_LIST O INNER JOIN MEMBER M ON (M.MEMBER_NO=O.MEMBER_NO) WHERE O.OIL_LIST_TYPE IN('환전') AND M.MEMBER_TYPE='B'
AND M.STATUS IN('Y','N')
AND M.STATUS='Y'
AND M.STATUS='N'
AND M.MEMBER_ID LIKE '%'||#{memberId}||'%'
AND (O.OIL BETWEEN TO_NUMBER(#{startMoney}) AND TO_NUMBER(#{endMoney}))
AND (TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(O.OIL_LIST_DATE,'rrrr/mm/dd'), 'yyyy/mm/dd') >= TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(#{today},'yyyy/mm/dd'), 'yyyy/mm/dd') AND TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(O.OIL_LIST_DATE,'rrrr/mm/dd'), 'yyyy/mm/dd') <= TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(SYSDATE,'rrrr/mm/dd'), 'yyyy/mm/dd'))
AND (TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(O.OIL_LIST_DATE,'rrrr-mm-dd'),'yyyy-mm-dd') >= TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(#{startDate},'yyyy-mm-dd'),'yyyy-mm-dd') AND TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(O.OIL_LIST_DATE,'rrrr-mm-dd'),'yyyy-mm-dd') <= TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(#{endDate},'yyyy-mm-dd'),'yyyy-mm-dd'))
ORDER BY OIL_LIST_NO DESC

SELECT (SELECT NVL(SUM(OIL),0) FROM OIL_LIST WHERE TO_CHAR(OIL_LIST_DATE, 'YYMM')='1901' AND OIL_LIST_TYPE='환전') AS JAN, (SELECT NVL(SUM(OIL),0) FROM OIL_LIST WHERE TO_CHAR(OIL_LIST_DATE, 'YYMM')='1902' AND OIL_LIST_TYPE='환전') AS FEB, (SELECT NVL(SUM(OIL),0) FROM OIL_LIST WHERE TO_CHAR(OIL_LIST_DATE, 'YYMM')='1903' AND OIL_LIST_TYPE='환전') AS MAR, (SELECT NVL(SUM(OIL),0) FROM OIL_LIST WHERE TO_CHAR(OIL_LIST_DATE, 'YYMM')='1904' AND OIL_LIST_TYPE='환전') AS APR, (SELECT NVL(SUM(OIL),0) FROM OIL_LIST WHERE TO_CHAR(OIL_LIST_DATE, 'YYMM')='1905' AND OIL_LIST_TYPE='환전') AS MAY, (SELECT NVL(SUM(OIL),0) FROM OIL_LIST WHERE TO_CHAR(OIL_LIST_DATE, 'YYMM')='1906' AND OIL_LIST_TYPE='환전') AS JUN, (SELECT NVL(SUM(OIL),0) FROM OIL_LIST WHERE TO_CHAR(OIL_LIST_DATE, 'YYMM')='1907' AND OIL_LIST_TYPE='환전') AS JUL, (SELECT NVL(SUM(OIL),0) FROM OIL_LIST WHERE TO_CHAR(OIL_LIST_DATE, 'YYMM')='1908' AND OIL_LIST_TYPE='환전') AS AUG, (SELECT NVL(SUM(OIL),0) FROM OIL_LIST WHERE TO_CHAR(OIL_LIST_DATE, 'YYMM')='1909' AND OIL_LIST_TYPE='환전') AS SEP, (SELECT NVL(SUM(OIL),0) FROM OIL_LIST WHERE TO_CHAR(OIL_LIST_DATE, 'YYMM')='1910' AND OIL_LIST_TYPE='환전') AS OCT, (SELECT NVL(SUM(OIL),0) FROM OIL_LIST WHERE TO_CHAR(OIL_LIST_DATE, 'YYMM')='1911' AND OIL_LIST_TYPE='환전') AS NOV, (SELECT NVL(SUM(OIL),0) FROM OIL_LIST WHERE TO_CHAR(OIL_LIST_DATE, 'YYMM')='1912' AND OIL_LIST_TYPE='환전') AS DEC FROM DUAL

SELECT (SELECT NVL(SUM(OIL),0) FROM OIL_LIST WHERE TO_DATE(TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD')) - TO_DATE(TO_CHAR(OIL_LIST_DATE, 'YYYYMMDD')) = 0 AND OIL_LIST_TYPE='환전') AS DAYZERO, (SELECT NVL(SUM(OIL),0) FROM OIL_LIST WHERE TO_DATE(TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD')) - TO_DATE(TO_CHAR(OIL_LIST_DATE, 'YYYYMMDD')) = 1 AND OIL_LIST_TYPE='환전') AS DAYONE, (SELECT NVL(SUM(OIL),0) FROM OIL_LIST WHERE TO_DATE(TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD')) - TO_DATE(TO_CHAR(OIL_LIST_DATE, 'YYYYMMDD')) = 2 AND OIL_LIST_TYPE='환전') AS DAYTWO, (SELECT NVL(SUM(OIL),0) FROM OIL_LIST WHERE TO_DATE(TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD')) - TO_DATE(TO_CHAR(OIL_LIST_DATE, 'YYYYMMDD')) = 3 AND OIL_LIST_TYPE='환전') AS DAYTHREE, (SELECT NVL(SUM(OIL),0) FROM OIL_LIST WHERE TO_DATE(TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD')) - TO_DATE(TO_CHAR(OIL_LIST_DATE, 'YYYYMMDD')) = 4 AND OIL_LIST_TYPE='환전') AS DAYFOUR, (SELECT NVL(SUM(OIL),0) FROM OIL_LIST WHERE TO_DATE(TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD')) - TO_DATE(TO_CHAR(OIL_LIST_DATE, 'YYYYMMDD')) = 5 AND OIL_LIST_TYPE='환전') AS DAYFIVE, (SELECT NVL(SUM(OIL),0) FROM OIL_LIST WHERE TO_DATE(TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD')) - TO_DATE(TO_CHAR(OIL_LIST_DATE, 'YYYYMMDD')) = 6 AND OIL_LIST_TYPE='환전') AS DAYSIX, (SELECT NVL(SUM(OIL),0) FROM OIL_LIST WHERE TO_DATE(TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD')) - TO_DATE(TO_CHAR(OIL_LIST_DATE, 'YYYYMMDD')) = 7 AND OIL_LIST_TYPE='환전') AS DAYSEVEN FROM DUAL

SELECT (SELECT NVL(SUM(OIL),0) FROM OIL_LIST WHERE TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDDHH24')) - TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(OIL_LIST_DATE, 'YYYYMMDDHH24')) = 0 AND OIL_LIST_TYPE='환전') AS TIME01, (SELECT NVL(SUM(OIL),0) FROM OIL_LIST WHERE TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDDHH24')) - TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(OIL_LIST_DATE, 'YYYYMMDDHH24')) = 1 AND OIL_LIST_TYPE='환전') AS TIME02, (SELECT NVL(SUM(OIL),0) FROM OIL_LIST WHERE TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDDHH24')) - TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(OIL_LIST_DATE, 'YYYYMMDDHH24')) = 2 AND OIL_LIST_TYPE='환전') AS TIME03, (SELECT NVL(SUM(OIL),0) FROM OIL_LIST WHERE TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDDHH24')) - TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(OIL_LIST_DATE, 'YYYYMMDDHH24')) = 3 AND OIL_LIST_TYPE='환전') AS TIME04, (SELECT NVL(SUM(OIL),0) FROM OIL_LIST WHERE TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDDHH24')) - TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(OIL_LIST_DATE, 'YYYYMMDDHH24')) = 4 AND OIL_LIST_TYPE='환전') AS TIME05, (SELECT NVL(SUM(OIL),0) FROM OIL_LIST WHERE TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDDHH24')) - TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(OIL_LIST_DATE, 'YYYYMMDDHH24')) = 5 AND OIL_LIST_TYPE='환전') AS TIME06, (SELECT NVL(SUM(OIL),0) FROM OIL_LIST WHERE TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDDHH24')) - TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(OIL_LIST_DATE, 'YYYYMMDDHH24')) = 6 AND OIL_LIST_TYPE='환전') AS TIME07, (SELECT NVL(SUM(OIL),0) FROM OIL_LIST WHERE TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDDHH24')) - TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(OIL_LIST_DATE, 'YYYYMMDDHH24')) = 7 AND OIL_LIST_TYPE='환전') AS TIME08, (SELECT NVL(SUM(OIL),0) FROM OIL_LIST WHERE TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDDHH24')) - TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(OIL_LIST_DATE, 'YYYYMMDDHH24')) = 8 AND OIL_LIST_TYPE='환전') AS TIME09, (SELECT NVL(SUM(OIL),0) FROM OIL_LIST WHERE TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDDHH24')) - TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(OIL_LIST_DATE, 'YYYYMMDDHH24')) = 9 AND OIL_LIST_TYPE='환전') AS TIME10, (SELECT NVL(SUM(OIL),0) FROM OIL_LIST WHERE TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDDHH24')) - TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(OIL_LIST_DATE, 'YYYYMMDDHH24')) = 10 AND OIL_LIST_TYPE='환전') AS TIME11, (SELECT NVL(SUM(OIL),0) FROM OIL_LIST WHERE TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDDHH24')) - TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(OIL_LIST_DATE, 'YYYYMMDDHH24')) = 11 AND OIL_LIST_TYPE='환전') AS TIME12,
(SELECT NVL(SUM(OIL),0) FROM OIL_LIST WHERE TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDDHH24')) - TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(OIL_LIST_DATE, 'YYYYMMDDHH24')) = 12 AND OIL_LIST_TYPE='환전') AS TIME13, (SELECT NVL(SUM(OIL),0) FROM OIL_LIST WHERE TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDDHH24')) - TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(OIL_LIST_DATE, 'YYYYMMDDHH24')) = 13 AND OIL_LIST_TYPE='환전') AS TIME14, (SELECT NVL(SUM(OIL),0) FROM OIL_LIST WHERE TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDDHH24')) - TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(OIL_LIST_DATE, 'YYYYMMDDHH24')) = 14 AND OIL_LIST_TYPE='환전') AS TIME15, (SELECT NVL(SUM(OIL),0) FROM OIL_LIST WHERE TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDDHH24')) - TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(OIL_LIST_DATE, 'YYYYMMDDHH24')) = 15 AND OIL_LIST_TYPE='환전') AS TIME16, (SELECT NVL(SUM(OIL),0) FROM OIL_LIST WHERE TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDDHH24')) - TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(OIL_LIST_DATE, 'YYYYMMDDHH24')) = 16 AND OIL_LIST_TYPE='환전') AS TIME17, (SELECT NVL(SUM(OIL),0) FROM OIL_LIST WHERE TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDDHH24')) - TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(OIL_LIST_DATE, 'YYYYMMDDHH24')) = 17 AND OIL_LIST_TYPE='환전') AS TIME18, (SELECT NVL(SUM(OIL),0) FROM OIL_LIST WHERE TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDDHH24')) - TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(OIL_LIST_DATE, 'YYYYMMDDHH24')) = 18 AND OIL_LIST_TYPE='환전') AS TIME19, (SELECT NVL(SUM(OIL),0) FROM OIL_LIST WHERE TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDDHH24')) - TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(OIL_LIST_DATE, 'YYYYMMDDHH24')) = 19 AND OIL_LIST_TYPE='환전') AS TIME20, (SELECT NVL(SUM(OIL),0) FROM OIL_LIST WHERE TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDDHH24')) - TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(OIL_LIST_DATE, 'YYYYMMDDHH24')) = 20 AND OIL_LIST_TYPE='환전') AS TIME21, (SELECT NVL(SUM(OIL),0) FROM OIL_LIST WHERE TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDDHH24')) - TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(OIL_LIST_DATE, 'YYYYMMDDHH24')) = 21 AND OIL_LIST_TYPE='환전') AS TIME22, (SELECT NVL(SUM(OIL),0) FROM OIL_LIST WHERE TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDDHH24')) - TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(OIL_LIST_DATE, 'YYYYMMDDHH24')) = 22 AND OIL_LIST_TYPE='환전') AS TIME23, (SELECT NVL(SUM(OIL),0) FROM OIL_LIST WHERE TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDDHH24')) - TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(OIL_LIST_DATE, 'YYYYMMDDHH24')) = 23 AND OIL_LIST_TYPE='환전') AS TIME24 FROM DUAL
